2675     * and if and only if {@code payloadWildcardType} models a Java
2676     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.WildcardType wildcard type} and
2677     * not any other type, and if and only if {@code
2678     * receiverGenericArrayType} models a {@linkplain
2679     * java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array type} and not
2680     * any other type.
2681     *
2682     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
2683     * method.</p>
2684     *
2685     * <p>This implementation returns {@code false} in all cases.
2686     *
2687     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
2688     * receiverGenericArrayType}; often a {@link
2689     * java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2690     *
2691     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadWildcardType};
2692     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
2693     *
2694     * @param receiverGenericArrayType the receiver type as described
2695     * above; must not be {@code null}
2696     *
2697     * @param payloadWildcardType the payload type as described above; must
2698     * not be {@code null}
2699     *
2700     * @param lowerBounded whether {@code payloadWildcardType} is a
2701     * lower-bounded wildcard type
2702     *
2703     * @return {@code false} in all cases
2704     *
2705     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
2706     * idempotent and deterministic.
2707     *

2709     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.

2715                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
2716                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded) {
2717      return false;
2718    }
2719
2720    private final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromNonParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
2721                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadNonParameterizedType) {
2722      if (payloadNonParameterizedType.componentType() == null) {
2723        if (payloadNonParameterizedType.lowerBounded()) {
2724          return this.typeVariableIsAssignableFromWildcardType(receiverTypeVariable, payloadNonParameterizedType, true);
2725        } else if (payloadNonParameterizedType.upperBounded()) {
2726          if (payloadNonParameterizedType.named()) {
2727            return this.typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverTypeVariable, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2728          } else {
2729            return this.typeVariableIsAssignableFromWildcardType(receiverTypeVariable, payloadNonParameterizedType, false);
2730          }
2731        } else {
2732          return this.typeVariableIsAssignableFromClass(receiverTypeVariable, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2733        }
2734      } else if (payloadNonParameterizedType.type() == payloadNonParameterizedType) {
2735        return this.typeVariableIsAssignableFromClass(receiverTypeVariable, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2736      } else {
2737        return this.typeVariableIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(receiverTypeVariable, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2738      }
2739    }

2979    private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromNonParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
2980                                                                           final boolean lowerBounded,
2981                                                                           final Type<Y> payloadNonParameterizedType) {
2982      if (payloadNonParameterizedType.componentType() == null) {
2983        if (payloadNonParameterizedType.lowerBounded()) {
2984          return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType, true);
2985        } else if (payloadNonParameterizedType.upperBounded()) {
2986          if (payloadNonParameterizedType.named()) {
2987            return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2988          } else {
2989            return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType, false);
2990          }
2991        } else {
2992          return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2993        }
2994      } else if (payloadNonParameterizedType.type() == payloadNonParameterizedType) {
2995        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2996      } else {
2997        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadNonParameterizedType);
2998      }
2999    }

3117     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
3118     * method.</p>
3119     *
3120     * <p>This implementation returns {@code false} in all cases.
3121     *
3122     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3123     * receiverWildcardType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3124     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3125     *
3126     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3127     * payloadGenericArrayType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3128     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3129     *
3130     * @param receiverWildcardType the receiver type as described
3131     * above; must not be {@code null}
3132     *
3133     * @param lowerBounded whether {@code receiverWildcardType} is a
3134     * lower-bounded wildcard type
3135     *
3136     * @param payloadGenericArrayType the payload type as described
3137     * above; must not be {@code null}
3138     *
3139     * @return {@code false} in all cases
3140     *
3141     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
3142     * idempotent and deterministic.
3143     *
3144     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
3145     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3146     *
3147     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
3148     */
3149    @OverridingEncouraged
3150    protected <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3151                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
3152                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3153      return false;
3154    }

3156    /**

3158     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadTypeVariable} is
3159     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
3160     * supplied {@code receiverWildcardType}, according to the

3200    @OverridingEncouraged

3202                                                                      final boolean lowerBounded,

3264  /**
3265   * An abstract partial {@link Semantics} that permits subtyping.
3266   *
3267   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3268   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3269   */
3270  @Experimental
3271  public static abstract class VariantSemantics extends Semantics {
3272
3273
3274    /*
3275     * Constructors.
3276     */
3277
3278
3279    /**
3280     * Creates a new {@link VariantSemantics}.
3281     */
3282    protected VariantSemantics() {
3283      super();
3284    }
3285
3286
3287    /*
3288     * Instance methods.
3289     */
3290
3291
3292    /**
3293     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
3294     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadClass} is assignable
3295     * to a reference bearing the type modeled by the supplied {@code
3296     * receiverClass}, according to the assignability rules modeled by
3297     * this {@link Semantics} instance, and if and only if {@code
3298     * payloadClass} models a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not
3299     * any other type, and if and only if {@code receiverClass} models
3300     * a {@linkplain Class Java class} and not any other type.
3301     *
3302     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
3303     * method.</p>
3304     *
3305     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if
3306     * {@link Type#supertypeOf(Type)
3307     * receiverClass.supertype(payloadClass)} returns {@code true}.
3308     *
3309     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3310     * receiverClass}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3311     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3312     *
3313     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
3314     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
3315     *
3316     * @param receiverClass the receiver type as described above; must
3317     * not be {@code null}
3318     *
3319     * @param payloadClass the payload type as described above; must
3320     * not be {@code null}
3321     *
3322     * @return {@code true} if and only if {@link
3323     * Type#supertypeOf(Type) receiverClass.supertypeOf(payloadClass)}
3324     * returns {@code true}
3325     *
3326     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
3327     * idempotent and deterministic.
3328     *
3329     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
3330     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3331     *
3332     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
3333     */
3334    @Override
3335    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3336      return receiverClass.supertypeOf(payloadClass);
3337    }
3338
3339    /**
3340     * Returns {@code true} if and only if a reference bearing the
3341     * type modeled by the supplied {@code payloadGenericArrayType} is
3342     * assignable to a reference bearing the type modeled by the
3343     * supplied {@code receiverGenericArrayType}, according to the
3344     * assignability rules modeled by this {@link Semantics} instance,
3345     * and if and only if {@code payloadGenericArrayType} models a
3346     * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array
3347     * type} and not any other type, and if and only if {@code
3348     * receiverGenericArrayType} models a {@linkplain
3349     * java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType generic array type} and not
3350     * any other type.
3351     *
3352     * <p>This method is called by the {@link #assignable(Type, Type)}
3353     * method.</p>
3354     *
3355     * <p>This implementation returns {@code true} if and only if the
3356     * {@linkplain Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
3357     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
3358     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
3359     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}.</p>
3360     *
3361     * @param <X> the kind of type modeled by the {@code
3362     * receiverGenericArrayType}; often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type
3363     * java.lang.reflect.Type}
3364     *
3365     * @param <Y> the kind of type modeled by the {@code payloadClass};
3366     * often a {@link java.lang.reflect.Type java.lang.reflect.Type}
3367     *
3368     * @param receiverGenericArrayType the receiver type as described
3369     * above; must not be {@code null}
3370     *
3371     * @param payloadGenericArrayType the payload type as described
3372     * above; must not be {@code null}
3373     *
3374     * @return {@code true} if and only if the {@linkplain
3375     * Type#componentType() component type} of the {@code
3376     * receiverGenericArrayType} {@linkplain #assignable(Type, Type)
3377     * is assignable from} the {@linkplain Type#componentType()
3378     * component type} of the {@code payloadGenericArrayType}
3379     *
3380     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
3381     * idempotent and deterministic.
3382     *
3383     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
3384     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
3385     *
3386     * @see #assignable(Type, Type)
3387     */
3388    @Override
3389    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3390                                                                                    final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3391      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
3392    }
3393
3394    final <X> List<? extends Type<X>> condense(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds) {
3395      if (!bounds.isEmpty()) {
3396        final Type<X> firstBound = bounds.get(0);
3397        if (firstBound.named() && firstBound.upperBounded()) {
3398          // it's a type variable
3399          return this.condense(firstBound.upperBounds());
3400        }
3401      }
3402      return bounds;
3403    }
3404
3405  }
3406
3407
3408  /**
3409   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements Java
3410   * type assignability semantics, which are covariant.
3411   *
3412   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3413   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3414   */
3415  @Experimental
3416  public static class CovariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3417
3418
3419    /*
3420     * Static fields.
3421     */
3422
3423
3424    /**
3425     * A convenient instance of {@link CovariantSemantics}.
3426     *
3427     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
3428     */
3429    public static final CovariantSemantics INSTANCE = new CovariantSemantics();
3430
3431
3432    /*
3433     * Constructors.
3434     */
3435
3436
3437    /**
3438     * Creates a new {@link CovariantSemantics}.
3439     */
3440    public CovariantSemantics() {
3441      super();
3442    }
3443
3444
3445    /*
3446     * Instance methods.
3447     */
3448
3449
3450    @Override
3451    protected <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3452      return this.assignable(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type());
3453    }
3454
3455    @Override
3456    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverClass, final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3457      final Type<X> receiverComponentType = receiverClass.componentType();
3458      return
3459        this.assignable(receiverComponentType == null ? receiverClass : receiverComponentType,
3460                        payloadGenericArrayType.componentType());
3461    }
3462
3463    @Override
3464    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
3465      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadType.upperBounds()) {
3466        if (this.assignable(receiverType, bound)) {
3467          return true;
3468        }
3469      }
3470      return false;
3471    }
3472
3473    @Override
3474    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType, final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3475      // Raw types are assignable and either the payload is a generic
3476      // class (and therefore a raw class) or the payload is a class
3477      // whose parameterized supertypes need to be evaluated.
3478      return
3479        this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass) &&
3480        (payloadClass.hasTypeParameters() ||
3481         this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadClass.supertypes()));
3482    }
3483
3484    @Override
3485    protected <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3486                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3487      return this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(receiverParameterizedType, payloadParameterizedType.supertypes());
3488    }
3489
3490    private final boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromAnyType(final Type<?> receiverParameterizedType,
3491                                                                   final Iterable<? extends Type<?>> payloadTypes) {
3492      for (final Type<?> payloadType : payloadTypes) {
3493        if (payloadType.hasTypeArguments() &&
3494            this.parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(receiverParameterizedType, payloadType)) {
3495          return true;
3496        }
3497      }
3498      return false;
3499    }
3500
3501    private final boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType0(final Type<?> receiverParameterizedType,
3502                                                                              final Type<?> payloadParameterizedType) {
3503      if (Type.equals(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3504        final List<? extends Type<?>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3505        final List<? extends Type<?>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3506        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
3507          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
3508            final Type<?> receiverTypeTypeArgument = receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
3509            final Type<?> payloadTypeTypeArgument = payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i);
3510            if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.wildcard() || payloadTypeTypeArgument.wildcard()) {
3511              if (!this.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
3512                return false;
3513              }
3514            } else if (!Type.equals(receiverTypeTypeArgument, payloadTypeTypeArgument)) {
3515              return false;
3516            }
3517          }
3518          return true;
3519        }
3520      }
3521      return false;
3522    }
3523
3524    @Override
3525    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3526                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3527      for (final Type<Y> bound : payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds()) {
3528        if (this.assignable(receiverParameterizedType, bound)) {
3529          return true;
3530        }
3531      }
3532      return false;
3533    }
3534
3535    @Override
3536    protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3537                                                                         final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3538      return this.assignable(receiverGenericArrayType.componentType(), payloadClass.componentType());
3539    }
3540
3541
3542    @Override
3543    protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
3544                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3545      return receiverTypeVariable.supertypeOf(payloadTypeVariable);
3546    }
3547
3548    @Override
3549    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3550                                                                     final boolean lowerBounded,
3551                                                                     final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3552      return
3553        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadClass) &&
3554        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadClass, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3555    }
3556
3557    @Override
3558    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3559                                                                                 final boolean lowerBounded,
3560                                                                                 final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3561      return
3562        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadParameterizedType) &&
3563        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadParameterizedType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3564    }
3565
3566    @Override
3567    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3568                                                                                final boolean lowerBounded,
3569                                                                                final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3570      return
3571        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadGenericArrayType) &&
3572        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadGenericArrayType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3573    }
3574
3575    @Override
3576    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3577                                                                            final boolean lowerBounded,
3578                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3579      return
3580        this.assignable(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0), payloadTypeVariable) &&
3581        (!lowerBounded || this.assignable(payloadTypeVariable, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0)));
3582    }
3583
3584    @Override
3585    protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromWildcardType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3586                                                                            final boolean receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded,
3587                                                                            final Type<Y> payloadWildcardType,
3588                                                                            final boolean payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
3589      final Type<X> receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound = receiverWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0);
3590      if (this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.upperBounds().get(0))) {
3591        if (receiverWildcardTypeLowerBounded) {
3592          return
3593            payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded &&
3594            this.assignable(payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0), receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
3595        }
3596        return
3597          !payloadWildcardTypeLowerBounded ||
3598          this.assignable(receiverWildcardTypeUpperBound, payloadWildcardType.lowerBounds().get(0));
3599      }
3600      return false;
3601    }
3602
3603
3604  }
3605
3606  /**
3607   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that does not permit
3608   * subtyping, but that compares wildcard types covariantly.
3609   *
3610   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3611   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3612   */
3613  @Experimental
3614  public static class InvariantSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3615
3616
3617    /*
3618     * Static fields.
3619     */
3620
3621
3622    /**
3623     * An instance of {@link InvariantSemantics}.
3624     *
3625     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
3626     */
3627    public static final InvariantSemantics INSTANCE = new InvariantSemantics();
3628
3629
3630    /*
3631     * Constructors.
3632     */
3633
3634
3635    /**
3636     * Creates a new {@link InvariantSemantics}.
3637     */
3638    public InvariantSemantics() {
3639      super();
3640    }
3641
3642
3643    /*
3644     * Instance methods.
3645     */
3646
3647
3648    @Override // VariantSemantics
3649    public <X, Y> boolean assignable(final Type<X> receiverType, final Type<Y> payloadType) {
3650      if (receiverType.wildcard() || payloadType.wildcard()) {
3651        return CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverType, payloadType);
3652      }
3653      return Type.equals(receiverType, payloadType);
3654    }
3655
3656  }
3657
3658  /**
3659   * A {@link VariantSemantics} implementation that implements the
3660   * rules of <a
3661   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
3662   * target="_parent"><em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.
3663   *
3664   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
3665   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
3666   */
3667  @Experimental
3668  public static class CdiSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3669
3670
3671    /*
3672     * Static fields.
3673     */
3674
3675
3676    /**
3677     * An instance of {@link CdiSemantics}.
3678     *
3679     * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
3680     */
3681    public static final CdiSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiSemantics();
3682
3683
3684    /*
3685     * Constructors.
3686     */
3687
3688
3689    /**
3690     * Creates a new {@link CdiSemantics}.
3691     */
3692    public CdiSemantics() {
3693      super();
3694    }
3695
3696
3697    /*
3698     * Instance methods.
3699     */
3700
3701
3702    /**
3703     * Returns {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
3704     * represents an <em>actual type</em>, which the <a
3705     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#assignable_parameters"
3706     * target="_parent">CDI specification</a> implies, but does not
3707     * explicitly state, is either a class, a parameterized type or a
3708     * generic array type.
3709     *
3710     * <p>Actual types, though not defined, are <a
3711     * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#typesafe_resolution"
3712     * target="_parent">critically important to CDI's concept of
3713     * <em>typesafe resolution</em></a>.</p>
3714     *
3715     * <p>The concept of an actual type is not mentioned in the <a
3716     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se17/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.1"
3717     * target="_parent">Java Language Specification</a>.
3718     *
3719     * @param type the {@link Type} in question; must not be {@code
3720     * null}
3721     *
3722     * @return {@code true} if and only if the supplied {@link Type}
3723     * returns {@code false} from invocations of both its {@link
3724     * #upperBounded()} and {@link #lowerBounded()} methods; {@code
3725     * false} otherwise
3726     *
3727     * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}
3728     *
3729     * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
3730     *
3731     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by
3732     * multiple threads.
3733     */
3734    public final boolean actualType(final Type<?> type) {
3735      return !type.upperBounded() && !type.lowerBounded();
3736    }
3737
3738    @Convenience
3739    @Override
3740    public final boolean assignable(final java.lang.reflect.Type receiverType,
3741                                    final java.lang.reflect.Type payloadType,
3742                                    final boolean ignoredBox) {
3743      // Boxing is always required in CDI.
3744      return this.assignable(JavaType.of(receiverType, true), JavaType.of(payloadType, true));
3745    }
3746
3747    @Override
3748    protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverClass,
3749                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3750      if (Type.equals(receiverClass, payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3751        for (final Type<Y> payloadTypeTypeArgument : payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
3752          if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
3753            // OK; it's Object.class or similar
3754          } else if (payloadTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
3755            final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds = payloadTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
3756            switch (bounds.size()) {
3757            case 0:
3758              // OK; it's effectively "extends Object"
3759              break;
3760            case 1:
3761              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
3762                return false;
3763              }
3764              break;
3765            default:
3766              return false;
3767            }
3768          } else {
3769            return false;
3770          }
3771        }
3772        return true;
3773      }
3774      return false;
3775    }
3776
3777    @Override
3778    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3779                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3780      if (Type.equals(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadClass)) {
3781        for (final Type<X> receiverTypeTypeArgument : receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments()) {
3782          if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.top()) {
3783            // OK
3784          } else if (receiverTypeTypeArgument.typeVariable()) {
3785            final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds = receiverTypeTypeArgument.upperBounds();
3786            switch (bounds.size()) {
3787            case 0:
3788              // OK
3789              break;
3790            case 1:
3791              if (!bounds.get(0).top()) {
3792                return false;
3793              }
3794              break;
3795            default:
3796              return false;
3797            }
3798          } else {
3799            return false;
3800          }
3801        }
3802        return true;
3803      }
3804      return false;
3805    }
3806
3807    @Override
3808    protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3809                                                                                      final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3810      if (Type.equals(receiverParameterizedType.type(), payloadParameterizedType.type())) {
3811        final List<? extends Type<X>> receiverTypeTypeArguments = receiverParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3812        final List<? extends Type<Y>> payloadTypeTypeArguments = payloadParameterizedType.typeArguments();
3813        if (receiverTypeTypeArguments.size() == payloadTypeTypeArguments.size()) {
3814          for (int i = 0; i < receiverTypeTypeArguments.size(); i++) {
3815            if (!CdiTypeArgumentSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(receiverTypeTypeArguments.get(i), payloadTypeTypeArguments.get(i))) {
3816              return false;
3817            }
3818          }
3819          return true;
3820        }
3821      }
3822      return false;
3823    }
3824
3825
3826    /*
3827     * Inner and nested classes.
3828     */
3829
3830
3831    @Experimental
3832    private static class CdiTypeArgumentSemantics extends VariantSemantics {
3833
3834      private static final CdiTypeArgumentSemantics INSTANCE = new CdiTypeArgumentSemantics();
3835
3836      private CdiTypeArgumentSemantics() {
3837        super();
3838      }
3839
3840      @Override
3841      protected final <X, Y> boolean classIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverClass,
3842                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3843        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverClass, payloadTypeVariable);
3844      }
3845
3846      @Override
3847      protected final <X, Y> boolean parameterizedTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverParameterizedType,
3848                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3849        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverParameterizedType, payloadTypeVariable);
3850      }
3851
3852      @Override
3853      protected final <X, Y> boolean genericArrayTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverGenericArrayType,
3854                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3855        return this.actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(receiverGenericArrayType, payloadTypeVariable);
3856      }
3857
3858      private final <X, Y> boolean actualTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverActualType,
3859                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3860        // Section 5.2.4 of the CDI specification is mealy-mouthed but
3861        // interpretable:
3862        //
3863        // "…the required type parameter [receiverActualType] is an
3864        // actual type [never defined, but implied by other sentences
3865        // scattered throughout the specification to be either a
3866        // class, parameterized type or generic array type], the bean
3867        // type parameter is a type variable [payloadTypeVariable] and
3868        // the actual type [receiverActualType] is assignable to the
3869        // upper bound[s], if any [there will always be one], of the
3870        // type variable [payloadTypeVariable], or…"
3871        //
3872        // So perhaps somewhat counterintuitively check all the bounds
3873        // of the *payload* and see if the *receiver* is assignable to
3874        // all of them.
3875        for (final Type<Y> bound : this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds())) {
3876          // Note that this is somewhat backwards to what you may expect.
3877          if (!CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound, receiverActualType)) {
3878            return false;
3879          }
3880        }
3881        return true;
3882      }
3883
3884      @Override
3885      protected final <X, Y> boolean typeVariableIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverTypeVariable,
3886                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3887        // Section 5.2.4 again:
3888        //
3889        // "…the required type parameter and the bean type parameter are
3890        // both type variables and the upper bound of the required [receiver]
3891        // type parameter is assignable to the upper bound, if any, of
3892        // the bean [payload] type parameter."
3893        //
3894        // The first of many problems with this:
3895        //
3896        // This is of course ambiguous.  See
3897        // https://issues.redhat.com/browse/CDI-440 which was
3898        // unceremoniously closed for no good reason.
3899        //
3900        // "For example, the bullet
3901        //
3902        // * the required type parameter and the bean type parameter
3903        //   are both type variables and the upper bound of the
3904        //   required type parameter is assignable to the upper bound,
3905        //   if any, of the bean type parameter.
3906        //
3907        // should have meaning similar to:
3908        //
3909        // for each upper bound T of the bean type parameter, there is
3910        // an (at least one) upper bound of the required type which is
3911        // assignable to T."
3912        //
3913        // This is not normal Java/covariant semantics.  In Java, if
3914        // you have two type variables, A extends Object and B extends
3915        // Object, you cannot assign B to A or vice versa.  Here, the
3916        // CDI specification is essentially performing a kind of type
3917        // erasure in this one case.
3918        //
3919        // In CDI, when a type variable is a type argument (by
3920        // definition of a parameterized type), the platform basically
3921        // erases it.  In CDI you cannot have a type-variable-typed
3922        // injection point, because of course you can't predict what
3923        // "value" that injection point's type will have at
3924        // application analysis time.  So it stands to reason that if
3925        // there is a type variable "anywhere in" the injection point
3926        // (as a type argument, say) it will effectively be erased to
3927        // its bounds.
3928        return this.match(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds(), receiverTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3929      }
3930
3931      @Override
3932      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromClass(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3933                                                                       final boolean lowerBounded,
3934                                                                       final Type<Y> payloadClass) {
3935        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadClass);
3936      }
3937
3938      @Override
3939      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromParameterizedType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3940                                                                                   final boolean lowerBounded,
3941                                                                                   final Type<Y> payloadParameterizedType) {
3942        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadParameterizedType);
3943      }
3944
3945      @Override
3946      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromGenericArrayType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3947                                                                                  final boolean lowerBounded,
3948                                                                                  final Type<Y> payloadGenericArrayType) {
3949        return this.wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(receiverWildcardType, lowerBounded, payloadGenericArrayType);
3950      }
3951
3952      private final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromActualType(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3953                                                                          final boolean lowerBounded,
3954                                                                          final Type<Y> payloadActualType) {
3955        return
3956          (!lowerBounded || this.match(payloadActualType, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds())) &&
3957          this.match(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds(), payloadActualType);
3958      }
3959
3960      @Override
3961      protected final <X, Y> boolean wildcardTypeIsAssignableFromTypeVariable(final Type<X> receiverWildcardType,
3962                                                                              final boolean lowerBounded,
3963                                                                              final Type<Y> payloadTypeVariable) {
3964        final List<? extends Type<Y>> condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds = this.condense(payloadTypeVariable.upperBounds());
3965        if (!lowerBounded || this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, receiverWildcardType.lowerBounds(), true)) {
3966          final List<? extends Type<X>> condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds = this.condense(receiverWildcardType.upperBounds());
3967          return
3968            this.match(condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false, condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false) ||
3969            this.match(condensedPayloadTypeVariableBounds, false, condensedReceiverWildcardUpperBounds, false);
3970        }
3971        return false;
3972      }
3973
3974      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
3975        return this.match(bound0, bounds1, true);
3976      }
3977
3978      private final <Y> boolean match(final Type<?> bound0, List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1, final boolean condense1) {
3979        if (!bounds1.isEmpty()) {
3980          if (condense1) {
3981            bounds1 = this.condense(bounds1);
3982          }
3983          boolean match = false;
3984          for (final Type<?> bound1 : bounds1) {
3985            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
3986              match = true;
3987              break;
3988            }
3989          }
3990          if (!match) {
3991            return false;
3992          }
3993        }
3994        return true;
3995      }
3996
3997      private final <X> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final Type<?> bound1) {
3998        return this.match(bounds0, true, bound1);
3999      }
4000
4001      private final <X> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final boolean condense0, final Type<?> bound1) {
4002        if (!bounds0.isEmpty()) {
4003          if (condense0) {
4004            bounds0 = this.condense(bounds0);
4005          }
4006          boolean match = false;
4007          for (final Type<X> bound0 : bounds0) {
4008            if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
4009              match = true;
4010              break;
4011            }
4012          }
4013          if (!match) {
4014            return false;
4015          }
4016        }
4017        return true;
4018      }
4019
4020      private final <X, Y> boolean match(final List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0, final List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1) {
4021        return this.match(bounds0, true, bounds1, true);
4022      }
4023
4024      private final <X, Y> boolean match(List<? extends Type<X>> bounds0,
4025                                         final boolean condense0,
4026                                         List<? extends Type<Y>> bounds1,
4027                                         final boolean condense1) {
4028        if (!bounds0.isEmpty() && !bounds1.isEmpty()) {
4029          for (final Type<X> bound0 : condense0 ? this.condense(bounds0) : bounds0) {
4030            boolean match = false;
4031            for (final Type<Y> bound1 : condense1 ? this.condense(bounds1) : bounds1) {
4032              if (CovariantSemantics.INSTANCE.assignable(bound0, bound1)) {
4033                match = true;
4034                break;
4035              }
4036            }
4037            if (!match) {
4038              return false;
4039            }
4040          }
4041        }
4042        return true;
4043      }
4044
4045    }
4046  }
4047}
